item.description:
Originally on the calendar for Saturday, now a Sunday ride. 

 Some 3,000 butterflies of all colors, shapes, sizes and varieties go dancing past and around you as you walk through the 8,000 sq ft conservatory.  Some may even land on you! Unique and very pretty place.  $12 Admission, only $10 over 62.

If we have enough time, we may even go to the Yankee Candle "Flagship" Store - a huge building with dozens of smaller shops inside, with an assortment of unusual items.
item.name: Deerfield Butterfly Conservatory
